cospar.pp.update_state_info¶

cospar.pp.update_state_info(adata, leiden_resolution=0.5)¶

Update state_info using scanpy.tl.leiden()

We assume that X_pca is computed.

Parameters
adata : AnnData object

n_neighbors : int, optional (default: 20)

neighber number for constructing the KNN graph, using the UMAP method.

leiden_resolution : float, optional (default: 0.5)

A parameter value controlling the coarseness of the clustering. Higher values lead to more clusters.

Returns

None, but the adata.obs[‘state_info’] is modified.
